Name: Early Worm
About the game: Are you the Early Worm that catches the apple? Early worm is family friendly physics based platformer about a worm that wants to collect all the apples. Sling your worm around 98 levels full of surprises: Stick to walls and ceilings with honey, bounce on the mushroom beds! Dive into the deep waters with diving bell! Jump around and solve mechanical puzzles! Thumble up and down in a rotating cube! Fling into the mysterious blackstuff and float around in the antigravity! These and many more crazy things await you in Early Worm. Wake up early and start jumping now! Can you make it to the end?
